text: Dore mwe murabakunda nyamara bo ntibabakunda, kandi mwemera ibitabo byose. N’iyo bahuye namwe bavuga (babaryarya) bati “Twaremeye”, ariko bakwiherera bakabarumira imitwe y’intoki (babakubitira agatoki ku kandi) kubera uburakari (ndengakamere) babafitiye. Vuga uti “Nimwicwe n’uburakari bwanyu!” Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Umumenyi uhebuje w’ibiri mu bituza
